str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of the original form of tlao; a balance, i.e. a certain weight or 'talent'.

str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.

str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

str2: From para and didomi; to surrender, i.e yield up, intrust, transmit.

str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

str2: See! Lo! Behold! Look! Second person singular imperative middle voice of eido; used as imperative lo!

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To gain, acquire, win (over), avoid loss. From kerdos; to gain.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.
